casebody.data:
Michael PIRES, Sr.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2017

Peter Tsimbidaros, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Michael Pires, Sr.'s petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 121, 165 A.3d 188 (2017), is denied.
